title: Turkey Sausage and Spinach Orecchiette
directions: Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add sausage, onions and garlic; cook 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in peppers and Italian seasoning; cook an additional 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add tomato sauce and simmer 2 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook orecchiette following package directions, about 10 minutes. Drain, reserving 1 cup cooking water.
To serve, spoon pasta into a large serving bowl. Top with shredded Asiago.
ingredients: 4 sweet Italian turkey sausages (about 3/4 lb), casings removed, crumbled
2 cups sliced sweet red and yellow peppers
